refnamediv.refpurpose: Retourne le nombre de colonnes dans un résultat

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: ocinumcols retourne le nombre de colonnes dans un résultat.

example.title: ociNumCols
example.programlisting:
\n";
    $conn = ociLogon("scott", "tiger");
    $stmt = ociparse($conn,"select * from emp");
    ociexecute($stmt);
    while ( ociFetch($stmt) ) {
        print "\n";
        $ncols = ociNumCols($stmt);
        for ( $i = 1; $i <= $ncols; $i++ ) {
            $column_name  = ociColumnName($stmt,$i);
            $column_value = ociResult($stmt,$i);
            print $column_name . ': ' . $column_value . "\n";
        }
        print "\n";
    }
    ociFreeStatement($stmt);
    ociLogoff($conn);
